wikipedia_page.main:
Gordon Watson (born 2 March 1954) is a British antique dealer and television presenter, and "one of the world's leading authorities on 20th and 21st century design".Watson was the only dealer to appear in all of the first four series of Channel 4's Four Rooms TV show. 
Since May 2016, he has his own series on BBC2, The Extraordinary Collector.
Watson lives and works in Chelsea, London.

response: Gordon Watson is the name of:
*Gordon Watson (communist) (1912–1945), New Zealand communist, journalist and soldier

From 3 to 14 October 2015, 306 objects from the Lambert Art Collection with estimates from £20 up to £3 million  were on show at Ely House in Dover Street, and then auctioned by Christie's on 14 October 2015. Lambert and many of the objects in the auction appear in episode two of The Extraordinary Collector, presented by Gordon Watson.
